summary: This document is an email chain from July 15, 2019, discussing the testimony of a female witness (referred to as 'she') regarding massages she gave to Jeffrey Epstein on Little St. James island. The emails clarify that the massages involved young adult women, not young girls, and that the massages turned sexual.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email discussion; a female witness described giving him massages on Little St. James that turned sexual.

events.title: Email discussion about witness testimony
events.description: An email chain discusses the details of a female witness's testimony regarding massages given to Jeffrey Epstein on Little St. James, clarifying they involved young adult women and turned sexual.

keyFacts: A female witness gave Jeffrey Epstein massages on Little St. James island that turned sexual.
The emails clarify that the massages described involved 'young adult women', not 'young girls'.
The discussion indicates the details were difficult for the witness to discuss.
The correspondence is dated July 15, 2019, suggesting ongoing inquiry or case development at that time.
